Presentazione: “Felix Klein’s Structuralism in Mathematics and Epistemology.” Structuralism in Physics and Mathematics, University of Bristol.

Presentazione: “Empirical and Formal Conditions in Helmholtz’s Theory of Measurement.” Dimensions of Measurement, Center for Interdisciplinary Research, University of Bielefeld.

Presentazione: “Are There Neo-Kantian Roots of Structural Realism?” European Philosophy of Science Association Conference, University of Helsinki.

Presentazione: „Die symbolischen Formen der Wirklichkeit: Cassirers Beitrag zur Relativierung des Kantischen Apriori“, Forum Philosophicum, Universität Tübingen.

Presentazione: “Are There Neo-Kantian Roots of Structural Realism?” FIRB: OntoForMat. “Classical Paradigms and Theoretical Foundation in Contemporary Research in Formal and Material Ontology,” Università degli Studi di Milano.

Presentazione: “Intuition and Conceptual Construction in Weyl’s Analysis of the Problem of Space,” Weyl and the Problem of Space, University of Konstanz.
Presentazione: “Reconsidering the Philosophical Roots of Helmholtz’s Theory of Measurement,” The Making of Measurement, University of Cambridge.

Presentazione: “Continuities and Discontinuities across Theory Change: Ernst Cassirer’s Relativized Conception of the A Priori,” Lunchtime Colloquium of the Center for Philosophy of Science, University of Pittsburgh.

Presentazione: "Reconsidering the Semantic View of Theories from a Historical Perspective,” The Semantics of Theories, Munich Center for Mathematical Philosophy.

Presentazione: “The Natural and the Normative Reconciled in Helmholtz’s Theory of Measurement”, In “The Natural and the Normative at 25,” Symposium with Gary Hatfield, presented at HOPOS 2016: The International Society for the History of Philosophy of Science Society Congress, University of Minnesota, 25 luglio 2016.
Presentazione: "Reconsidering the Semantic View of Theories from a Historical Perspective", XII Conference of the Italian Society for Analytic Philosophy (SIFA).
Presentazione: “Arithmetization as a tool of discovery in Felix Klein’s research program and epistemological writings”, Eighth French Philosophy of Mathematics Workshop (FPMW 8) Marseille.

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Postdoctoral research fellow of the German Academic Exchange Service (DAAD) per lo svolgimento del progetto di ricerca: Ernst "Cassirers Wissenschaftsphilosophie: Ordnung, Maß und mathematische Methode" presso l'Università di Paderborn, Germania. Si allega il conferimento della borsa.

Residente presso il Mediterranean Institute for Advanced Research at the Aix-Marseille University per lo svolgimento di ricerche scientifiche di carattere interdisciplinare nell'ambito della storia della filosofia e della storia della matematica. Si allega il contratto di lavoro presso l'Università di Aix-Marseille.

Postdoctoral fellow Zukunftskolleg – Marie Curie affiliata al Dipartimento di Filosofia dell'Università di Konstanz. Progetto di ricerca: "Mathematical and Transcendental Method in Ernst Cassirer's Philosophy of Science". Si allega un attestato dello Zukunftskolleg.

Visiting fellow of the Pittsburgh Center for Philosophy of Science per lo svolgimento di ricerche relative al progetto "Mathematical and Transcendental Philosophy in Ernst Cassirer's Philosophy of Science". Si allega l'invito dell'Università di Pittsburgh.
